comment: Despite being an online course, Professor D was always available for whatever her students needed. At the beginning of each week, she'd post a video full of assignment/quiz reminders. Additionally, the few time I did email her, she responded immediately. This course could seem workload heavy, but if you stay on top of the work, you'll do fine!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: (2400) Assignments & quizzes are laid out in the beginning. Likely would have a much lower grade if it wasn't for the extra credit. Not doing too well on the assignments, projects, or quizzes, it is still possible to get an A because of the amount of volunteer extra credit. She gave me an extra chance to complete an assignment from a 0% to a high B
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is an amazing professor!!! Take her right now. She is super nice and understanding. I was never bored in her class and i was so excited for an 8am like...... She is also a great resource for anyone's future in sports and she provides great connections. I laughed and was engaged the whole class period

Her class was very easy, the assignments were relevant and she was an easy grader on the projects she assigned. As long as you follow instructions you should be able to get an A. Really enjoyed her online class and will be taking another in the Fall!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Prof. Deblanc is one of a kind. At the beginning of the semester, she goes over the entire course and her expectations. She does not put up with late work but is willing to help you.  If you want to enter the sports world this class is a MUST. She provides many opportunities that can help you get a jump start in your career and help you network.
Truly such a caring professor. Makes class fun and entertaining. If you do all the work on time you'll get an A. One of my favorite professors here.

Nicest Professor. Take her. Her work is clear and straight to the point. Quizzes and Test are so so easy. You will have to do two volunteer opportunities but it's so easy. I took her online class and was the best thing I could've done.

Professor DeBlanc is incredible. She's been my favorite teacher at KSU so far. She truly cares about her students and their future success. She makes class fun and interesting and doesn't do a typical lecture like most other teachers. She makes class very interactive and is open for lots of discussions. The work load is light and easy.

Take her! She is a great professor who gets how hectic life can be so she is very understadning. She is up front about how she wants her work and when she wants it. If you complete things early/on time then you will thrive in this class.

Her class is really easy. Weekly quizzes which are open book/note with two tries. She has two projects one that was easy and the other i struggled with. You had to interview a professional in Sports Management career, I didn't know any. It was fully online and asynchronous so there was no interaction really. But easy A if you do the weekly quizzes
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria
